name: Resized
description:
Bigger...
Smaller...
Bigger... Smaller...
Smaller...
Sma... !!!

Restart...

Bigger...
Smaller...


Survive if you can be the right size at the right time.

-------------------------------------

Resized is a minimalistic puzzle platformer. Plan your route and drive carefully.

-------------------------------------

Soundtrack: "Dreams Become Real" Kevin MacLeod
